30 gchar* map_colorimetry_to_sampling_j2k(const gchar *colorspace){
31 
32  /* compare values that can be in the colorimetry field to the actual value in caps */
33  /* the values that can takes the colorimetry field can be found by launching the following command
34  * "gst-inspect-1.0 openjpegenc"
35  */
36  if ( !strcmp(colorspace ,colo_RGB ))
37  return sampling_RGB;
38  else if ( !strcmp(colorspace ,colo_YUV ))
39  return sampling_YUV;
40  else if ( !strcmp(colorspace ,colo_GRAY ))
41  return samping_GRAY;
42  else
43  return "";
44 }
45 
51 gchar* map_sampling_to_colorimetry_j2k(const gchar *sampling){
52 
53  /* compare values that can be in the colorimetry field to the actual value in caps */
54  /* the values that can takes the colorimetry field can be found by launching the following command
55  * "gst-inspect-1.0 openjpegenc"
56  */
57  if ( !strcmp(sampling ,sampling_RGB ))
58  return colo_RGB;
59  else if ( !strcmp(sampling ,sampling_YUV ))
60  return colo_YUV;
61  else if ( !strcmp(sampling ,samping_GRAY ))
62  return colo_GRAY;
63  else
64  return "";
65 
66 }
67 /*
68  * This function tries to save a maximum of information (in the form of capabilities)
69  * of a video stream. As each new element in pipeline may be used to gathered new relevant information
70  * to initiate the MIB, we should use this function to gathered information on the video stream
71  * each time we add a element to the Gstreamer pipeline. Therefor a videoFormatTable_entry should be passed in parameters.
72  * This entry should be the same for a given stream, for each time we pass through this function.
73  */
74 void fill_entry(GstStructure* source_str_caps, struct videoFormatTable_entry *video_info, gpointer stream_datas){
75  stream_data *data = stream_datas;
76  /*videoFormatBase*/
77  if( gst_structure_has_field(source_str_caps, "encoding-name") ){
78  video_info->videoFormatBase = (char*) g_value_dup_string (gst_structure_get_value(source_str_caps, "encoding-name"));
79  }else if ( video_info->videoFormatBase==NULL ){
80  video_info->videoFormatBase = "";
81  }
82  /*VideoFormatSampling*/
83  /* case of RAW type video */
84  if( gst_structure_has_field(source_str_caps, "sampling") ){
85  video_info->videoFormatSampling = (char*) g_value_dup_string (gst_structure_get_value(source_str_caps, "sampling"));
86  }else if( video_info->videoFormatSampling==NULL ){
87  video_info->videoFormatSampling = "";
88  }
89  /* case of J2K type video */
90  if( gst_structure_has_field(source_str_caps, "colorspace")){
91  gchar* colorspace = (char*) g_value_dup_string (gst_structure_get_value(source_str_caps, "colorspace"));
92  video_info->videoFormatSampling = g_strdup(map_colorimetry_to_sampling_j2k(colorspace));
93  }else if( video_info->videoFormatSampling==NULL ){
94  video_info->videoFormatSampling = "";
95  }
96  /*videoFormatBitDepth*/
97  if( gst_structure_has_field(source_str_caps, "depth")){
98  video_info->videoFormatBitDepth = strtol ( (char* ) g_value_dup_string ( gst_structure_get_value(source_str_caps, "depth")), NULL , 10 ); /* the string is converted into long int, basis 10 */
99  }
100  /*videoFormatFps*/
101  if( gst_structure_has_field(source_str_caps, "framerate")){
102  int numerator = gst_value_get_fraction_numerator(gst_structure_get_value(source_str_caps, "framerate"));
103  int denominator = gst_value_get_fraction_denominator(gst_structure_get_value(source_str_caps, "framerate"));
104  video_info->videoFormatFps = (long) (numerator/denominator);
105  }
106  /*videoFormatColorimetry*/
107  if( gst_structure_has_field(source_str_caps, "colorimetry")){
108  video_info->videoFormatColorimetry = (char*)g_value_dup_string (gst_structure_get_value(source_str_caps, "colorimetry"));
109  }else if( video_info->videoFormatColorimetry==NULL ){
110  video_info->videoFormatColorimetry = "";
111  }
112  /*videoFormatInterlaced*/
113  if( gst_structure_has_field(source_str_caps, "interlace-mode")){
114  gchar* video_interlaced_mode = g_value_dup_string(gst_structure_get_value(source_str_caps, "interlace-mode"));
115  if ( !strcmp( (char*)video_interlaced_mode, "progressive"))
116  video_info->videoFormatInterlaced = vivoe_progressive;
117  else if ( !strcmp( (char*)video_interlaced_mode, "interlaced"))
118  video_info->videoFormatInterlaced = vivoe_interlaced;
119  else
120  video_info->videoFormatInterlaced = vivoe_none;
121  }
122  /*videoFormatMaxVertRes*/
123  if( gst_structure_has_field(source_str_caps, "height")){
124  if (G_VALUE_HOLDS_INT(gst_structure_get_value(source_str_caps, "height")))
125  video_info->videoFormatMaxVertRes = (long) g_value_get_int( gst_structure_get_value(source_str_caps, "height"));
126  else
127  video_info->videoFormatMaxVertRes = strtol ( (char* ) g_value_dup_string ( gst_structure_get_value(source_str_caps, "height")), NULL , 10 ); /* the string is converted into long int, basis 10 */
128  }
129  /*videoFormatMaxHorzRes*/
130  if( gst_structure_has_field(source_str_caps, "width")){
131  if (G_VALUE_HOLDS_INT(gst_structure_get_value(source_str_caps, "width")))
132  video_info->videoFormatMaxHorzRes = (long) g_value_get_int( gst_structure_get_value(source_str_caps, "width"));
133  else
134  video_info->videoFormatMaxHorzRes = strtol ( (char* ) g_value_dup_string ( gst_structure_get_value(source_str_caps, "width")), NULL , 10 ); /* the string is converted into long int, basis 10 */
135  }
136 
137  /*channelRTppt (saved in rtp_datas - payload type of the channel should be something like 96 or 127*/
138  if( gst_structure_has_field(source_str_caps, "payload")){
139  if (G_VALUE_HOLDS_INT(gst_structure_get_value(source_str_caps, "payload"))){
140  data->rtp_datas->rtp_type = (long) g_value_get_int( gst_structure_get_value(source_str_caps, "payload"));
141  /* case of a service USer, we need to initialize Rtppt */
142  video_info->videoFormatRtpPt = (long) g_value_get_int( gst_structure_get_value(source_str_caps, "payload"));
143  }
144  }
145 
146  /* clock-rate */
147  if( gst_structure_has_field(source_str_caps, "clock-rate")){
148  if (G_VALUE_HOLDS_INT(gst_structure_get_value(source_str_caps, "clock-rate")))
149  data->rtp_datas->clock_rate = g_value_get_int( gst_structure_get_value(source_str_caps, "clock-rate"));
150  }
151  /* ------------------------------------------------------------------- */
152  /* ONLY FOR MPEG-4 videos - relevant information to build SDP messages */
153 
154  /* profile-level-id */
155  if( gst_structure_has_field(source_str_caps, "profile-level-id")){
156  data->rtp_datas->profile_level_id = (char*) g_value_dup_string (gst_structure_get_value(source_str_caps, "profile-level-id"));
157  }
158 
159  /* config */
160  if( gst_structure_has_field(source_str_caps, "config")){
161  data->rtp_datas->config = (char*) g_value_dup_string (gst_structure_get_value(source_str_caps, "config"));
162  }
163 }
164 
171 int initialize_videoFormat(struct videoFormatTable_entry *video_info, gpointer stream_datas, long *channel_entry_index ){
172  stream_data *data = stream_datas;
173 
174  g_debug("intialize new videoFormatEntry and new channelEntry in table");
175 
176  /* Then we are sure that we can create a new entry */
177  videoFormatTable_createEntry( video_info->videoFormatIndex, video_info->videoFormatType,
178  disable, video_info->videoFormatBase,
179  video_info->videoFormatSampling, video_info->videoFormatBitDepth,
180  video_info->videoFormatFps, video_info->videoFormatColorimetry,
181  video_info->videoFormatInterlaced, video_info->videoFormatCompressionFactor,
182  video_info->videoFormatCompressionRate, video_info->videoFormatMaxHorzRes,
183  video_info->videoFormatMaxVertRes, video_info->videoFormatRoiHorzRes,
184  video_info->videoFormatRoiVertRes, video_info->videoFormatRoiOriginTop,
185  video_info->videoFormatRoiOriginLeft, video_info->videoFormatRoiExtentBottom,
186  video_info->videoFormatRoiExtentRight, data->rtp_datas->rtp_type,
187  data);
188 
189  char *channelUserDesc = get_desc_from_conf(video_info->videoFormatIndex);
190  if (channelUserDesc == NULL)
191  channelUserDesc="";
192 
193  /* initialize channel resolution to roi resolution if this is a roi or to video resoltion if there is no ROI */
194  int channelHorzRes;
195  int channelVertRes;
196  if ( video_info->videoFormatRoiHorzRes && video_info->videoFormatRoiVertRes ){
197 
198  channelHorzRes = video_info->videoFormatRoiHorzRes;
199  channelVertRes = video_info->videoFormatRoiVertRes;
200 
201  }else{
202 
203  channelHorzRes = video_info->videoFormatMaxHorzRes;
204  channelVertRes = video_info->videoFormatMaxVertRes;
205 
206  }
207 
208  /* At the same time we copy all of those parameters into video channel */
209  channelTable_createEntry( channelNumber._value.int_val+1, video_info->videoFormatType,
210  channelUserDesc, channelStop,
211  video_info->videoFormatIndex, video_info->videoFormatBase,
212  video_info->videoFormatSampling, video_info->videoFormatBitDepth,
213  video_info->videoFormatFps, video_info->videoFormatColorimetry,
214  video_info->videoFormatInterlaced, video_info->videoFormatCompressionFactor,
215  video_info->videoFormatCompressionRate, channelHorzRes,
216  channelVertRes, video_info->videoFormatRoiOriginTop,
217  video_info->videoFormatRoiOriginLeft, video_info->videoFormatRoiExtentBottom,
218  video_info->videoFormatRoiExtentRight, data->rtp_datas->rtp_type,
219  0/*IP*/, 0 /* packet delay*/,
220  default_SAP_interval, video_info->videoFormatIndex, /*defaultVideoFormatIndex*/
221  0/*default receive IP*/, data);
222 
223  *channel_entry_index = channelNumber._value.int_val+1;
224  /* increase channelNumber as we added an entry */
225  channelNumber._value.int_val++;
226 
227  return EXIT_SUCCESS;
228 
229 #if 0
230  if(videoFormatTable_head == NULL){
231 
232  /* Then we are sure that we can create a new entry */
233  videoFormatTable_createEntry( video_info->videoFormatIndex, video_info->videoFormatType,
234  disable, video_info->videoFormatBase,
235  video_info->videoFormatSampling, video_info->videoFormatBitDepth,
236  video_info->videoFormatFps, video_info->videoFormatColorimetry,
237  video_info->videoFormatInterlaced, video_info->videoFormatCompressionFactor,
238  video_info->videoFormatCompressionRate, video_info->videoFormatMaxHorzRes,
239  video_info->videoFormatMaxVertRes, video_info->videoFormatRoiHorzRes,
240  video_info->videoFormatRoiVertRes, video_info->videoFormatRoiOriginTop,
241  video_info->videoFormatRoiOriginLeft, video_info->videoFormatRoiExtentBottom,
242  video_info->videoFormatRoiExtentRight, data->rtp_datas->rtp_type,
243  data);
244 
245  char *channelUserDesc = get_desc_from_conf(video_info->videoFormatIndex);
246  if (channelUserDesc == NULL)
247  channelUserDesc="";
248 
249  /* initialize channel resolution to roi resolution if this is a roi or to video resoltion if there is no ROI */
250  int channelHorzRes;
251  int channelVertRes;
252  if ( video_info->videoFormatRoiHorzRes && video_info->videoFormatRoiVertRes ){
253 
254  channelHorzRes = video_info->videoFormatRoiHorzRes;
255  channelVertRes = video_info->videoFormatRoiVertRes;
256 
257  }else{
258 
259  channelHorzRes = video_info->videoFormatMaxHorzRes;
260  channelVertRes = video_info->videoFormatMaxVertRes;
261 
262  }
263 
264  /* At the same time we copy all of those parameters into video channel */
265  channelTable_createEntry( channelNumber._value.int_val+1, video_info->videoFormatType,
266  channelUserDesc, channelStop,
267  video_info->videoFormatIndex, video_info->videoFormatBase,
268  video_info->videoFormatSampling, video_info->videoFormatBitDepth,
269  video_info->videoFormatFps, video_info->videoFormatColorimetry,
270  video_info->videoFormatInterlaced, video_info->videoFormatCompressionFactor,
271  video_info->videoFormatCompressionRate, channelHorzRes,
272  channelVertRes, video_info->videoFormatRoiOriginTop,
273  video_info->videoFormatRoiOriginLeft, video_info->videoFormatRoiExtentBottom,
274  video_info->videoFormatRoiExtentRight, data->rtp_datas->rtp_type,
275  0/*IP*/, 0 /* packet delay*/,
276  default_SAP_interval, video_info->videoFormatIndex, /*defaultVideoFormatIndex*/
277  0/*default receive IP*/, data);
278 
279  *channel_entry_index = channelNumber._value.int_val+1;
280  /* increase channelNumber as we added an entry */
281  channelNumber._value.int_val++;
282 
283  }else{
284  /* if the table of video format is not empty for this device, check if this format is already in the table
285  * for that, iterate the table
286  */
287  struct videoFormatTable_entry *iterator = videoFormatTable_head ;
288  gboolean exists = FALSE; /* a boolean to indicate weather the entry already exists in the table or not*/
289  while(iterator != NULL && !exists ){
290  /* compare streaming entry format to iterator format*/
291  if(compare_entries(iterator,video_info)){
292  /* if their the same: set the status to enable */
293  iterator->videoFormatStatus = enable;
294  exists = TRUE;
295  }
296  /* iterator = next entry */
297  iterator = iterator->next;
298  }
299  /* check if the entry does not already exist in the table*/
300  if ( !exists && (videoFormatNumber._value.int_val <=255) ){
301  /*
302  * So add it!
303  * But check that the maximum number of video format has not been reached already
304  */
305  videoFormatTable_createEntry( video_info->videoFormatIndex, video_info->videoFormatType,
306  disable, video_info->videoFormatBase,
307  video_info->videoFormatSampling, video_info->videoFormatBitDepth,
308  video_info->videoFormatFps, video_info->videoFormatColorimetry,
309  video_info->videoFormatInterlaced, video_info->videoFormatCompressionFactor,
310  video_info->videoFormatCompressionRate, video_info->videoFormatMaxHorzRes,
311  video_info->videoFormatMaxVertRes, video_info->videoFormatRoiHorzRes,
312  video_info->videoFormatRoiVertRes, video_info->videoFormatRoiOriginTop,
313  video_info->videoFormatRoiOriginLeft, video_info->videoFormatRoiExtentBottom,
314  video_info->videoFormatRoiExtentRight, data->rtp_datas->rtp_type,
315  data );
316 
317  /* increase videoFormatNumber as we added an entry */
318  char *channelUserDesc = get_desc_from_conf(video_info->videoFormatIndex);
319  if (channelUserDesc == NULL)
320  channelUserDesc="";
321 
322  /* initialize channel resolution to roi resolution if this is a roi or to video resoltion if there is no ROI */
323  int channelHorzRes;
324  int channelVertRes;
325  if ( video_info->videoFormatRoiHorzRes && video_info->videoFormatRoiVertRes ){
326 
327  channelHorzRes = video_info->videoFormatRoiHorzRes;
328  channelVertRes = video_info->videoFormatRoiVertRes;
329 
330  }else{
331 
332  channelHorzRes = video_info->videoFormatMaxHorzRes;
333  channelVertRes = video_info->videoFormatMaxVertRes;
334 
335  }
336 
337  /* At the same time we copy all of those parameters into video channel */
338  channelTable_createEntry( channelNumber._value.int_val+1, video_info->videoFormatType,
339  channelUserDesc, channelStop,
340  video_info->videoFormatIndex, video_info->videoFormatBase,
341  video_info->videoFormatSampling, video_info->videoFormatBitDepth,
342  video_info->videoFormatFps, video_info->videoFormatColorimetry,
343  video_info->videoFormatInterlaced, video_info->videoFormatCompressionFactor,
344  video_info->videoFormatCompressionRate, channelHorzRes,
345  channelVertRes, 0,
346  0, 0,
347  0, data->rtp_datas->rtp_type,
348  0,/*receive Address*/ 0 /* packet delay*/,
349  default_SAP_interval, video_info->videoFormatIndex, /*defaultVideoFormatIndex-0 is taken by default*/
350  0/*default receive IP*/, data);
351 
352  *channel_entry_index = channelNumber._value.int_val+1;
353  /* increase channelNumber as we added an entry */
354  channelNumber._value.int_val++;
355  }
356  /* !!! IMPORTANT !!!
357  * Do not free iterator, it was positioning on HEAD */
358  /* No malloc was done anyway it should not been deleted */
359  }
360  return EXIT_SUCCESS;
361 #endif
362
